stripped_text: As an additional cost to play this operation, spend click. Install up to 2 cards from HQ, creating a new remote server each time. Place 2 advancement counters on each of those cards. You cannot score or rez either of those cards this turn.
text:
As an additional cost to play this operation, spend [click].
Install up to 2 cards from HQ, creating a new remote server each time. Place 2 advancement counters on each of those cards. You cannot score or rez either of those cards this turn.
title: Mitosis
